meanings.definition: The quality or state of being gaudy or showy in a tasteless or excessive way.
meanings.sent1: The gaudinesses of her outfit made everyone stare.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with gaudinesses, from the bright colors to the flashy decorations.
meanings.sent3: Despite the gaudinesses of the party decorations, they somehow all worked together.
meanings.sent4: The gaudinesses of the jewelry she wore reflected her flamboyant personality.
meanings.sent5: The gaudinesses of the carnival rides left the children in awe.

meanings.definition: The gaudy or showy appearance or quality of something.
meanings.sent1: The gaudinesses of the painting clashed with the simplicity of the room.
meanings.sent2: Her gaudinesses in fashion always made her stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent3: The gaudinesses of the cake made it almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The gaudinesses of the fireworks lit up the night sky in a dazzling display.
meanings.sent5: The gaudinesses of the peacock's feathers mesmerized onlookers.
